en she hear her mom calling her, she was

ig hug, but she knew that she had to wait

ded that it was time

Rodimus smiled broadly as more and more evidence of N=
ightlight=92s full
recovery was being shown. There was always so much weigh=
t on his
shoulders as of late, weight and guilt. For what he had done, for =
what
he allowed to be done. But being here and now with Nightlight he could=

feel at least some of that weight lifting from his shoulders.

=93She is w=
aiting outside my love.=94 Rodimus said softly. =93We were just
making sure=
 you were strong enough first before we brought her in.=94

Turning to wave=
, Rodimus motioned for Elita to be brought in.

ng Caliber stood watching Kup and Windlord for a moment, Leo Walking

ide him. =93We had better get Torca.=94 Wing Caliber said in low
tones. =93=
It will soon be decision time.=94

Leo II nodded as he looked over at the w=
indown showing the interior of
the medical lab. He could see Rodimus and Ni=
ghtlight, a small wistful
smile playing about his face. =93Perhaps we can g=
ive them a little more
time.=94

almost following Lord Elder, with no a
> real purpose by now.

<NEW>

Lord =
Elder slowed as he walked away, noticing that none of the others
had taken =
the moment to talk with Perceptor. He shot a glance at
Uproar and Quickstri=
de and then looked back at Perceptor. With a
motion of his hand he gestured=
 for them to talk with Perceptor.

He turned to walk in the direction of Tu=
scon when he was waylaid . . .

> <OLD>
>
> Straight Shot catches up to Lor=
d Elder. If she had learned anything from
> her brother, it was how to put =
up a brave face, and do the things that you
> were afraid to do no matter i=
f you knew the outcome or not.
>
> "Lord Elder, sir, you're right too, I kn=
ow what I gotta do, for my brother's
> sake. I - really should try ta talk =
ta Legacy about all this, and get his

 goes, Courage 101 in session."

<NEW>

Elder smiled broadly, =93That is ve=
ry good!=94 he said happily. =93May
Primus be with you.=94 He said as he pa=
tted her on the back and then
continued on his to see Tuscon

> <OLD>

> S=
he now walks off to find Legacy and by intuition, finds him readilly. Being=

> as small as she was, what she was about to do, would take every ounce of=

> bravory in her tiny spark. To be sure that she was at eye level with Leg=
acy,
> so she didn't need to crane her neck, she finds the highest point in=
 the
> room, climbs on it, and looks to him as if she were about to talk to=
 Tucson
> personally.

<NEW>

By the time Straight Shot caught up with Lega=
cy he had made it to one
of the shops that seemed to liter the Ark. He had =
made it into his own
personal quarters and work station.

He had not added =
much to the place or even made many changes. There
was a small section for =
recharging chamber and a small modified
computer panel; something that was =
needed since these rooms were
designed for Autobots who were several times =
larger than any of them.

Legacy was standing at one of the computer panel =
as information
scrolled across the screen.

He turned as Straight Shot ente=
red.

> <OLD>
>
> "Legacy, if it's okay, could - we talk for a little while=
?"

<NEW>

Legacy looked at Straight Shot, his cold cyclopean gaze fastenin=
g onto
her. =93That would be acceptable.=94 Legacy said emotionlessly. He t=
urned
to face her completely, folding his arms behind his back he waited
pa=
tiently for her to say what she had to say.

> <OLD>
>
> He types in a code=
 to close the doors, to allow them a little privacy.
> Once hearing them sh=
ut, he smiles to Talon, and gently takes her hands.

<NEW>

By the time Lor=
d Elder caught up with Tuscon he was inside his
chamber, he could smell the=
 metallic oils that Talon customarily wore
as well. He smiled grimly as he =
saw that the privacy codes on Tuscon=92s
room had been engaged.

With a nod=
 Lord Elder turned away. There would be time enough for talk.

As he turned=
 he noticed Torca as he walked up to him, a grim look on
his face. =93Are y=
ou okay?=94 Lord Elder said, concern written on his
face.

Torca nodded, =
=93We need to talk.=94 Is all he said, his reverberous tone
echoing in the =
halls.

> <OLD>
>
> Talon widely smiled and said while she jumped to Tucson=
's arms and said
> "YES!! YES!!"

<NEW>

With a start Elder thought he hear=
d some sort of outburst from the
room but he could not make out what it was=
. He smiled thinking that at
least it sounded happy, they all needed happin=
ess in their life.

He looked back at Torca he nodded, =93Of course.=94

th a gesture from Torca he and Elder began walking towards the bridge.
